mn116:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati isigilismiṁ pabbate.
mn116:2.1_0: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ vebhāraṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.3_0: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vebhārassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.4_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ paṇḍavaṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.6_0: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, paṇḍavassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.7_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ vepullaṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.9_0: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, vepullassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.10_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ gijjhakūṭaṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:2.12_0: “Etassapi kho, bhikkhave, gijjhakūṭassa pabbatassa aññāva samaññā ahosi aññā paññatti.
mn116:2.13_0: Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, imaṁ isigiliṁ pabbatan”ti?
mn116:3.1_0: “Imassa kho pana, bhikkhave, isigilissa pabbatassa esāva samaññā ahosi esā paññatti.
mn116:3.2_0: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhikkhave, pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṁ.
mn116:3.3_0: Te imaṁ pabbataṁ pavisantā dissanti, paviṭṭhā na dissanti.
mn116:3.10_0: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn116:3.11_0: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn116:4.1_0: “Ariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.2_0: upariṭṭho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.3_0: tagarasikhī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.4_0: yasassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.5_0: sudassano nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.6_0: piyadassī nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.7_0: gandhāro nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.8_0: piṇḍolo nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.9_0: upāsabho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.10_0: nīto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.11_0: tatho nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi,
mn116:4.12_0: sutavā nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi;
mn116:4.13_0: bhāvitatto nāma, bhikkhave, paccekasambuddho imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsī ahosi.
mn116:6.10_0: Aṅgo ca paṅgo ca guttijito ca;
